name: Jefferson County Scenic Byway
description: This byway's chief appeal is its historic sites. Quite a few of the homes are on the National Register of Historic places and some were associated with the Underground Railroad.
fullDescription: This byway's chief appeal is its historic sites. Quite a few homes are on the National Register of Historic Places and some were associated with the Underground Railroad. In addition, the route is built on a greenway that supports a superb recreation trail.

websites.name: Ohio Byway Program - Jefferson County Southern Scenic Byway
